data.comment: The match is underway in Atlanta.
Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 1, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Miami.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Atlanta.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
In the minute 6, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Miami in the half of Atlanta.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Miami.
Atlanta's Erick Torres misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 11, Guido Gonzales Jr awards Miami a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 19, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Atlanta.
Free kick Atlanta.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Ben Sweat of Miami smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 26, Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Miami.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Atlanta.
In the minute 30, In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Miami's Jay Chapman has been booked in Atlanta.
Eric Remedi of Atlanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 31, Miami have a goal kick.
In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Atlanta Miami attack through Brek Shea. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the home team in Atlanta.
Throw-in Atlanta.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Atlanta throw-in in Miami's half.
In the minute 34, Atlanta to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the home team in Atlanta.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 41, Important block from the Miami defence as Ezequiel Barco fires in a strike for Atlanta.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Miami.
Anton Walkes (Atlanta) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 43, Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
In Atlanta Miami drive forward through Lewis Morgan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Miami.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Miami close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Atlanta.
Edgar Castillo for Atlanta drives towards goal at Mercedes-Benz Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 49, Free kick Miami.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 52, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Miami.
At Mercedes-Benz Stadium, Leandro Gonzalez Pirez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 56, Miami have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Miami are pushing forward but Leandro Gonzalez Pirez's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
In the minute 56, At Mercedes-Benz Stadium, Miami are penalized for being offside.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 58, Guido Gonzales Jr awards the home team a throw-in.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Miami.
In the minute 61, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for Atlanta, close to Miami's area.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards Miami a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Atlanta make their first substitution with Jake Mulraney replacing Emerson Hyndman.
The home team have replaced Ezequiel Barco with Tyler Wolff. This is the second substitution made today by Stephen Glass.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Miami throw-in in Atlanta's half.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Atlanta have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Miami.
Attention is being given to Miami’s Andres Reyes and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 70, Andres Reyes for Miami is back on the field again.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Atlanta.
Anton Walkes (Atlanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Wil Trapp is replacing Jay Chapman for the away team.
Robbie Robinson is on a sub for Lewis Morgan for Miami.
In the minute 74, In Atlanta, Brek Shea of Miami is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
In the minute 76, Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
The home team replace Brooks Lennon with Jurgen Damm.
Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of Miami.
In the minute 78, Free kick Miami.
Miami's Brek Shea is on target but unsuccessful.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Atlanta.
In the minute 80, Atlanta drives forward and Jake Mulraney gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 81, Matias Pellegrini is on a sub for Brek Shea for Miami.
Free kick Miami.
Atlanta needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 83, George Bello is replacing Edgar Castillo for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Miami have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlanta's half?
Nicolas Figal for Miami gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Atlanta.
In the minute 87, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Jake Mulraney (Atlanta) gets a yellow card.
Miami advance rapidly upfield but Guido Gonzales Jr blows for offside.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Miami throw-in in Atlanta's half.
Miami's Matias Pellegrini gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Atlanta defender.
In the minute 89, Miami push forward at Mercedes-Benz Stadium and Matias Pellegrini gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atlanta defence.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Miami surge into the attack at Mercedes-Benz Stadium but Juan Agudelo’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Atlanta.
Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
That's full-time at Mercedes-Benz Stadium. The final score is 0-0.
Ben Sweat (Miami) has received a first yellow card.
Jurgen Damm is booked for the home team.
